resources.string: Welcome to MadLibs, fill out the information in the boxes to create your own story! Press the "Next" button to continue.
Great! Now, give your character a profession, it can be something serious like a "Chef" or even something wacky like "King of Donuts"!
Hunting, running,fishing or how about knitting? What\'s your characters\' favourite thing to do?
Fight! Enter your characters favourite tool to use.
Cake,pie,cookies or even ice-cream! Enter something delicious!
This story needs a villain! Name one now!
And finally, a reward! Add one now!

One day, the Warrior Shannon was traveling through the countryside eating a Rice Crispie Treat when suddenly, a Dragon came out to attack the local farmers! Shannon jumped to the rescue to Fight with the Warrior\'s favorite weapon, the Battle Axe! Once the Dragon was defeated, it exploded into a giant pile of Gold Bars! The End!
